intro: P2P user from China. 中文用户。ZeroNet老司机：）请务必看[中文论坛](http://127.0.0.1:43110/GFWtalk.bit)频繁更新的**置顶贴**，包含最新的ZeroMe、ZeroNet使用技巧和注意事项。推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，有很多增强功能，包括话题、贴图、收藏页……

post.body: Hello ZeroMe!
test done, working, thanks all!
what happen if someone join both  blue and red hub? i see up4@zeroid.bit ( 1BLPKyrF2D4ertte6JnAa6oWAMYzZGwKQz ), a.k.a Vincent Olivier, did that. which hub will his or her posts be stored, or both?
What happens to the ZeroHello? the following feeds all gone? guys, try to refresh your ZeroHello you will tell. @nofish

I'v posted [Recent ZeroMe structure is bad for hub migrating and censorship proof. My idea is...](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:7_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/Recent+ZeroMe+structure+is+bad+for+hub+migrating+and+censorship+proof+My+idea+is) in ZeroTalk , please read it and comment to that post, any ideas are welcome.
@nofish , I reported [There are long time painful things using ZeroNet under Tor always mode](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ) in ZeroTalk

@nofish , in ZeroHello Newsfeed press space should not run into focus of search box. Space works like  `PgDn` in most browsers, I believe users would like to use space to view Newsfeed up to down. fix: [this line of code](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroHello/blob/7eeb4598e7ae1b63dd8907da18b6ee56dc63fc7e/js/FeedList.coffee#L67) should be `if e.charCode? and e.charCode == 0 or e.charCode == 32`

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i Green hub is up! And it is the default one in ZeroMe instead of Red hub. You will miss something if you do not seed it. If you don't believe it, please see http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/content.json And anyone from Green hub? Tell me!

after some tests with new version Rev1413,  I found:
- serving 300+ zites over clearnet -> OK
- serving 10+  zites under tor always mode -> OK
- serving 300+ zites under tor always mode  -> some problems mention [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+nofish+There+are+long+time+painful+things+using+ZeroNet+under+Tor+always+mode)

So, can ZeroNet control Tor to deal with many connections more nicely? ( stream isolation, more socks port, more Guard node...)
Hub feature, reducing the needed number of connections, is important under Tor always mode. Thus, can we easily tell someone to run his/her own hub? Obviously, more hubs more connections. Then we run into the [previous discussion]( http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:7_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/Recent+ZeroMe+structure+is+bad+for+hub+migrating+and+censorship+proof+My+idea+is) which is worthy of thinking again.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Create+profile 这个地址是新的ZeroMe用户才点的！老用户千万不要点里面的Join！！（Never click `Join` if you have been a ZeroMe user!!）有些用户信息混乱丢失，就是因为乱点！乱点后就会重置一些信息！ZeroMe老用户换电脑登录时，如果没有自动登录，可以点`Select user to post new content`，选择自己的ZeroID，然后千万不要点`Create new profile`，而应等待进度条走完，然后按F5刷新就已登录了。我亲测可行！等会儿加入论坛置顶贴。乱点的后果自负！
在[ZeroMe首页](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit)，右上角有三个点，点击以后出现Follow username mentions和Follow comments on your posts，点击打勾后，可以在ZeroHello首页Newsfeed看到别人@你和回复你帖子的提醒。
ZeroMe编辑评论时，按Tab+Enter发送，不需要鼠标点`SAVE`

ZeroNet被爆出严重漏洞，可以冒充某人ZeroID，爆料人是美国女生@kaffie哦，很牛吧。 [爆料帖子](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/29) 。现在强烈建议所有人立即手动强制升级ZeroNet到Rev1425，[升级方法](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Nse6WcodQ5Mj6ZwvZvuyCVvQESwuxbCUy/?Topic:10_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+ZeroNet+0+3+7) Please update ZeroNet manually ASAP to Rev1425 to fix a serious bug mentioned [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/29) by @kaffie
发现bit.no.com这个proxy真的很牛X，访问中文论坛网址直接是 GFWtalk.bit.no.com 酷？
‘The End Of The Copyright Whack-A-Mole?’ – with Zeronet’s Tamas Kocsis ( @nofish ) https://stealthisshow.com/s02e01/

Seems that ZeroNet has 1000+ users already! but All Users page only shows latest 999 http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Users
Maybe we need paging? @nofish
【紧急通知】ZeroNet的新版0.4.1已经推送，大幅修正漏洞，大幅优化，所有人应立即升级ZeroNet，[升级方法](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Nse6WcodQ5Mj6ZwvZvuyCVvQESwuxbCUy/?Topic:10_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ)

好消息！[据报道](http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/zeronet-revolutionary-new-decentralised-p2p-internet-post-edward-snowden-world-1580897)，并经过[他本人确认](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj/1473695005)，ZeroNet作者获得[Blue Systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Systems)资助，全职开发ZeroNet。这下子ZeroNet的后续开发就有保证了，不会因为各种原因停滞。Blue Systems是个德国富二代拥有的，专门资助自由软件，是KDE的主要资助者。（天朝的富二代们怎么跟人家差距这么大？）
ZeroNet作者的Optional files improvements计划，在ZeroMe增加图片分享功能 https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/584

I LOVE [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/)
推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，相比原版增加了话题（如 [#ZeroMePlus](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Hashtags&tag=ZeroMePlus)）、拉黑、调整评论显示顺序、一键分享站点等功能。开发很活跃，有什么想法可以用英文跟 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 提。（ZeroNet作者更专注于核心功能开发，前端界面的小优化还是要靠其他开发者）。一开始进去时点`Grant`，然后要耐心等一会才会显示帖子（建立数据库时页面空白）。

继续推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，这两天又增加了用户页显示Likes列表功能（部分替代转发功能），以及点击显示图片功能（作者的[演示](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/1475170734)，语法就是普通markdown的贴图语法）。 ZeroMe "Plus"的用法见我上一条推。

继续推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，这几天又增加了Tooltip功能，即鼠标悬停在Activity feed里的某条，能够显示对应帖子/留言的更多内容。ZeroMe "Plus"的用法见我上上条推。
作者说ZeroNet 0.5 准备出来了，支持ZeroMe原生传图
发现一些用户的系统时间不准，导致在ZeroNet里显示评论顺序混乱。请检查自己的系统时间，最好设置成与对时服务器自动同步。系统时间不准可以破坏匿名性，是一个指纹，可以把你的不同身份关联起来。这也是Whonix里有专门的对时机制的原因，那个对时机制能随机加入微小的时间偏差，消除该指纹。
Everyone下的时间线和Activity feed长时间被中文占满了，再这样下去感觉老外会疯。估计不久就要像论坛一样克隆出一套ZeoMeCN，给中文用户自嗨。

今天白天的时候大家讨论得很热烈啊，关于自己理想中的网络社区。我刚才看了下，还没时间完全看完，就先收藏了几位的帖子有时间再看。大家相互交流，观点的碰撞，是极好的。大方向大家基本是统一的，具体的东西我建议是走一步看一步，因为经常是计划赶不上变化。经历过一些事后，自己的观点都会有变化。比如说之前ZeroNet作者说ZeroMe的老帖子会把hub撑大，要提供一键删除旧贴功能，让用户自己删，否则达到空间限额后发不了贴他不会帮提限额了。我当时强烈建议他用optional files来存旧贴，他当时说optional files有缺点啊，会搞得太复杂啊，不想搞啊。大概两个月后，也就是前几天，他就在github的某issue里说，新版本的改进版optional files可以用来存旧贴。

comment.body: THX, Zeronauta. I see ur reply, but even though I follow u, I can't reply to ur comment directly, why?
cyrax你的动作挺快啊！你知道怎么在留言区直接回复某人么？就像zerotalk里那样有个relpy点
thank you freekazoid@zeroid.bit

THX! Good job! Did u remember I mentioned that it's  better to publish to more hubs as backup in case of the hub's owner does evil things or other unexpected happen? I hope it will be implemented  in the near future.
很久没看到你，潜水这么久，怎么zerome一发布就冒出来了：）

didn't you backup before doing? I have automatic snapshots of all sites I seed, if you think your lost posts are important, just tell me, I'll try to recover for you.
ok, i'll try.
sorry, my cron didn't work! I didn't notice that! fxck! Doesn't  KDE's Task Scheduler run automatically after reboot?

@Nofish: strange. I have to close **all** ZeroMe tabs, and reopen, to see the `Reply` button. Does the `@`have mention effect?

我对你的data.json的自动快照：http://127.0.0.1:43110/17iF64gTLycSohUSJsFyq7FMYsQfMqghJa/?13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ_3
跟ZeroNet/data/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/data/users/12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx/data.json手动合并，合并前注意备份。合并后随意点一下心形按钮，按F5应该就能生效
@这人笑起来很Cute: 如果你的帖子删除了，下面的评论也看不见了，不知评论有没有价值。这个问题确实算个bug
@这人笑起来很Cute: 跟其他的markdown基本通用。具体见中文论坛置顶贴
@Wrewolf: THX！ added to ZeroWiki http://127.0.0.1:43110/138R53t3ZW7KDfSfxVpWUsMXgwUnsDNXLP/?Page:proxies
@这人笑起来很Cute: 按照格式手动合并。你可以自己观察json格式，从而发现规律。合并前备份。
@这人笑起来很Cute: 跟ZeroNet/data/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/data/users/12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx/data.json手动合并，合并前注意备份。合并后随意点一下心形按钮，按F5应该就能生效（这是我在你之前帖子的留言）
@这人笑起来很Cute: 手动合并就是用文本编辑器打开，在json文件之间复制粘贴其内容，重要的是找到规律

我用的快照方法Automated rsync snapshot script ： http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:4_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ
中文版 http://127.0.0.1:43110/gfwtalk.bit/?Topic:30_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+ZeroNet
THX! Please see my post: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:7_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/Recent+ZeroMe+structure+is+bad+for+hub+migrating+and+censorship+proof+My+idea+is
I think the hub you're using should be set to accept nanasi at first
it's cool to use PAC, we have a chrome extension to do that though.
So Cooool! Can we see followers?

@PaintNinja: no, you have to. you can test it by yourself. pls note that, user registry is a separate site serving new users info, not the the actual posts/comments of a user. So, to some degree, user registry site is not a hub. When you see new users info from user registry site, you can not say " I can see their contents without seeding hubs''.

@Nofish:  in ZeroHello Newsfeed press space should not run into focus of search box. Space works like  `PgDn` in most browsers, I believe users would like to use space to view Newsfeed up to down. I got a fix, see my post http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/7
@这人笑起来很Cute: 点了链接你就能在Everyone里接收Green hub的内容
@Xyzos: 看不懂就点第一个链接就对了
@PaintNinja: for reference: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LcQTyUYkq3n458rkHVQxhHyvUdmSYFURd/?Post:22:Testing+P2P+streaming(18x) source code: https://github.com/zeronetscript/universal_p2p

@PaintNinja: actually it's NOT my project. demo file is old, maybe no seeders any more. webtorrent has some limitations which have be pointed out by the author of universal_p2p. however, webtorrent may be enough for music.
you can use this slide https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1_2qK1IuOKJ51pgBvllZ9Yu7Au2l551t3XBgyTSvilew/pub?start=false&loop=false&delayms=3000&slide=id.g9a1cce9ee_0_4
@Nofish: updated to Rev1422,  with --connected_limit 5, no luck:( From Stats page, i see only about 100 connections, obviously not enough for 300+ sites. Can favorited sites have priority to connect?

updated to Rev1422, with --connected_limit 5, tested again, still no luck. From Stats page, i see only about 100 connections under Tor always mode, obviously not enough for 300+ sites. Can favorited sites have priority to connect?
@梦里乾坤大: 现在ZeroMe才上线一周，很多人还不知道，现在中文用户还不到GFW TALK中文论坛用户的十分之一。
@Xyzos: 之后不要再乱点！等把老贴都覆盖了，再往后应该没什么影响
@Xyzos: 过一段时间又会乱是因为你又乱点了。把其他的HUB删除，你就收不到那些hub的帖子、评论、动态了，你也无法评论那些hub的帖子。比如我是在red的，你只有blue，就算你关注我了，你也收不到我的帖子，你只能收到我在blue的评论
@Xyzos: 把DATA下的文件夹都删除了有何用？打开ZeroNet又会把混乱的数据从其他节点同步过来。把其他的HUB删掉其实就是掩耳盗铃罢了。
@Xyzos: 乱就乱吧，除了碍眼，有什么实质影响吗？你把你的重要帖子备份一下，等到老帖子都被覆盖了，应该会好。实在不爽就重新注册一个ZeroID，洗心革面，重新做人。
@weakish: 可惜这样只能搜索昵称，而不是ID
@Mzero: 按住Ctrl+Alt+Shift键，在你的zeronet.cmd的上级文件夹（一般是ZeroBundle文件夹）图标上点右键，选择`在此处打开命令窗口`。然后你用记事本打开zeronet.cmd，复制里面的命令，在命令行窗口里输入，然后观察输出提示什么错误。
@weakish: 多谢，我转到论坛
@Mzero: 直接输入\Python\python.exe呢？你确定命令行已经定位到ZeroBundle了吗？
@Mzero: 我刚才看了一下代码，代码被你掐头去尾了。看这里我的回帖 http://127.0.0.1:43110/gfwtalk.bit/?Topic:10_144GQ5Uz9dYQJ1MwjSFWWboLgHwdGpv21x/zeronet+shut+down

@Nofish: oh, you mean tab+enter to save the post/comment when EDIT it? but I think we need some shortcut to start a new line when we post a NEW one. Press enter just send the new message, no way to start a new line AFAIK.
@Helloarch: 点铅笔图标，save旁边就是Delete，这是基本操作，请仔细看论坛置顶贴
@Mzero: 论坛已经回复。这个帖子里的几个贴图站，你随便选一个贴图 http://127.0.0.1:43110/gfwtalk.bit/?Topic:4_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/
@Helloarch: 目前hub还没有分语言，点我名字就可以看我fo的中文用户，自己fo起来
@Mzero: 那个pyc文件不应该这样用。我在论坛回复你
@Mzero: 我已经在论坛回复你。这没反应太奇怪了，要不请 @breakwa11 看看？ 论坛对应帖子在 http://127.0.0.1:43110/gfwtalk.bit/?Topic:10_144GQ5Uz9dYQJ1MwjSFWWboLgHwdGpv21x
@Mzero: 按照我论坛的最新回复也没反应？你出问题后重启电脑了吗？重启试试。还有，你之前有没有把zeronet加入自动启动？你重启电脑后在任务管理器里能看到python进程吗？
@Mzero: 我没看明白，也得到了同样的结果指的是什么结果？、
@Nofish: sometimes press Tab a little bit too long, it selects the second nearest link, then press enter, my edited comments will be gone!
@Mzero: 你的第二个帖子图片，输出了python版本信息，是正常的。第一个帖子图片那样一股脑复制粘帖不对。cmd是批处理，里面有if等条件控制语句，不能全部输入命令行窗口的。要按照我之前给你提取出的命令语句输入，就像第二个帖子图片那样的。
我这几天很忙，实在没时间跟大家交流互动。硬挤出一点时间来发布这个严重bug的信息。

你说的那个项目感觉就是zeronet的马甲。而且根本没细说怎么域名P2P。zeronet的域名实际上就是namecoin的域名，只不过zeroname把namecoin客户端的作用替代掉了，让用户不需要在本地装namecoin客户端。只要你愿意，你可以把zeronet的Zeroname-local插件启用，就可以直接对接本地namecoin客户端，完全P2P。不过一般情况下没什么必要。
@weakish: glad to hear you do snapshot too. but your snapshot span is too long. mine is 10min if my VM is running. you know, rsync snapshot does not eat much disk.
THX!
THX! feature request: display which posts a user likes in his/her profile page, maybe between  `Activity feed` and `Following` on the left.

@Talnicrom: all likes are public data which can be found in user's content.json, and  be queried by SQL. I agree it still makes sense to give users the option of whether or not to display their likes on their profile page. And there should be a page where a user can always see his/her own likes no matter the option is on or off. Since ZeroMe still lacks retweet feature, I really want the likes feature some what take place of  retweet feature.

@Talnicrom: Another feature request: show Tooltip of content of post or comment instead of ' xx hours ago' when hover the first two lines of content of post or comment in Activity feed.  The first two lines contain so little info that in most case we have to click the post's link to see it, wasting time. The same to the likes in Activity feed.

@Nekocross: 其实我想的是搞完全独立的另一套ZeoMe，跟现在这一套不通的。就像现在的zeronet里的英文论坛和中文论坛。想跟老外交流可以来这，咱们自己交流去ZeoMeCN。为什么要这样呢？举个现实例子，一开始zeronet作者nofish是fo我的，因为我是这的第一个中文用户，当时都跟老外英文交流。但是后来中文用户来了，我必须要发点中文推吧？当时我就预感nofish会unfo我，几天后果然。 @Helloarch 你说的信息割据不准确，这是文化割据，天然割据，没有办法的，哪怕有翻译也没用，不信你google翻译一个中文段子试试。
